question: What is the main objective of the Krishi Udan Scheme?
option2: Offer affordable freight movement through aeroplane
option3: Offer affordable air transport to people
option4: Help farmers to transport agricultural produce
answer: Help farmers to transport agricultural produce
explanation: Under Union Budget 2020-21, the Government introduced the Krishi Udan scheme. It is to offer on both domestic and international routes to help farmers in transporting agricultural products and improve the product value.
